html:
For today only B&H Photo has on sale the FotodioX Pro LED P60 1×1 Bi-Color LED Light Panel for only $159.95, saving you $90.

Key features include;

  • For Film, Broadcast & Video Production
  • Output: 2063 Lux at (120° 5600K)
  • Color Temperature: 2700 to 6500K
  • AC Adapter, Optional Battery Power
  • Measures 16.3 x 14.2 x 3.1″
  • CRI 95 | TLCI 97
  • Control Panel, App, Wired & Wireless DMX
  • Quiet Passive Cooling
  • 11 Special Effects

Great for studio or location shooting, including TV, film, and portrait photography, the sturdy aluminum Pro LED P60 1×1 Bi-Color LED Light Panel from FotodioX employs 1792 LEDs to output variable color (visible on its LCD) from 2700 to 6500K with a CRI/TLCI rating of 95/97, your assurance of accurate color reproduction. The light is also dimmable from 10 to 100% without flicker. You can control color and brightness locally on the fixture via wired or wireless DMX, or via a mobile lighting control app for Android or Apple devices.

The P50 uses quiet passive heat control that doesn’t generate noise, which can be a problem in sound-sensitive environments. The panel is barely warm to the touch, benefitting the talent’s comfort. One of the panel’s handy features is its 11 special effects, which include lightning, tracing, fireworks, police car, screen, faulty bulb, flash, turn signal, high beam, low beam, and breath. The P60 runs on universal 100 to 240V current but will also run on an optional V-mount battery when AC power is unavailable.

Benefits

  • Adjustable bi-color 2700-6500K with CRI/TLCI ratings of 95/97 and a lifespan of up to 50,000 hours.
  • Preinstalled special effects can be controlled from a distance with the mobile lighting control app (available for Apple and Android devices) to help you create the perfect scene.
  • LED heat prevention technology ensures your light will emit steady and accurate light under varying conditions. Suitable for indoor or outdoor photography and videography. Great for studio or location shoots, including TV, film, portrait photography, and more.
  • Dimmable from 10 to 100% and flicker-free due to its PWM integrated design. The solid aluminum shell provides durability and enhanced heat dissipation for long product life.
  • Adjustable all-metal yoke for safely mounting on stands and achieving any angle needed.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
